title: Days of the Omer 5784/2024, by Karen Levine
author: Karen Levine

coauthors.name: Karen Levine
coauthors.bio: Karen Levine is a member of the clergy team of the Woodstock Jewish Congregation in Woodstock, New York. She is a skilled and creative ritual leader as well as a multi-instrumental musician and visual artist.

excerpt: This is an updated version of a chart that I have been creating and sharing for ten years. This grid for counting the omer includes the secular date for 2024 as well as Hebrew dates and the sefirot associated with each day of the omer. More information can be found on my website. . . .
content:
DOWNLOAD: PDF

This is an updated version of a chart that I have been creating and sharing for ten years. This grid for counting the omer includes the secular date for 2024 as well as Hebrew dates and the sefirot associated with each day of the omer. More information can be found on my website.

Omer grid 5784 (Karen Levine 2024)
